languages.text: "Нет, я уже труп, я понимаю. Но со мной есть невооруженные люди. Наши семьи, которые не хотят и не умеют биться. Дети. Старики. Люди, подобные моим сестре и племяннице. Их кровь тебе тоже нужна? Им ты тоже будешь мстить? Или ограничишься моей жизнью?"

"No, I know I'm a dead man walking. But there are unarmed people here with me: our families, who have neither the desire nor the ability to fight. Our children, our elderly. People like my sister and niece. Do you want their blood on your hands as well? Will you take revenge on them, too, or is my life enough?"
languages.original_text: "Нет, я уже труп, я понимаю. Но со мной есть невооруженные люди. Наши семьи, которые не хотят и не умеют биться. Дети. Старики. Люди, подобные моим сестре и племяннице. Их кровь тебе тоже нужна? Им ты тоже будешь мстить? Или ограничишься моей жизнью?"

traits.locale_text: "No, I understand that I am a dead man walking. But there are unarmed people here with me. Our families who don't want to and don't know how to fight, the children and the elderly. People like my sister and niece, do you remember them? Do you want their blood on your hands as well? Will you take revenge on them, too, or will you be satisfied with my life?"
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

traits.locale_text: "No, I understand that I am a dead man walking. But there are unarmed people here with me. Our families who don't want to and don't know how to fight, the children and the elderly. People like my sister and niece, do you remember them? Do you want their blood on your hands as well? Will you take revenge on them, too, or will you be satisfied with my life?"
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

Do you want their blood on your hands as well? Will you take revenge on them, too, or is my life enough?"

Do you want their blood on your hands as well? Will you take revenge on them, too, or is my life enough?"

People like my sister and niece. Do you want their blood on your hands as well? Will you take revenge on them, too, or is my life enough?"
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

traits.locale_text: "No, I know I'm a dead man walking. But there are unarmed people here with me: our families, who have neither the desire nor the ability to fight. Our children, our elderly. People like my sister and niece. Do you want their blood on your hands as well? Will you take revenge on them, too, or is my life enough?"
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: «No, ya sé que soy un muerto andante. Pero aquí hay gente desarmada: nuestras familias, que carecen de ganas y de capacidad de luchar. Nuestros niños y ancianos. Gente como mi hermana y mi sobrina. ¿Quieres manchar tus manos también con su sangre? ¿Te vengarás de los indefensos, o te basta con mi vida?».
languages.original_text: "No, I know I'm a dead man walking. But there are unarmed people here with me: our families, who have neither the desire nor the ability to fight. Our children, our elderly. People like my sister and niece. Do you want their blood on your hands as well? Will you take revenge on them, too, or is my life enough?"

traits.locale_text: «No, ya sé que soy un muerto andante. Pero aquí hay gente desarmada: nuestras familias, que carecen de ganas y de capacidad de luchar. Nuestros niños y ancianos. Gente como mi hermana y mi sobrina. ¿Las recuerdas? ¿Quieres manchar tus manos también con su sangre? ¿Te vengarás de los indefensos, o te basta con mi vida?».
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: 「いや、私が死人であることは分かっていますよ。でも、この場所には丸腰の人間もいる。戦う意欲も能力もない私たちの家族、子供や老人たちがいるのです。妹や姪のような人たちだっている。他のみんなの血も見たいのですか？彼らにも復讐するのか、それとも私の命で十分なのか…どっちです？」
languages.original_text: "No, I know I'm a dead man walking. But there are unarmed people here with me: our families, who have neither the desire nor the ability to fight. Our children, our elderly. People like my sister and niece. Do you want their blood on your hands as well? Will you take revenge on them, too, or is my life enough?"

traits.locale_text: 「いや、私が死人であることは分かっていますよ。でも、この場所には連れの丸腰の人間がいる。戦う意欲も能力もない私たちの家族です。私たちの子どもたち、年寄りたちがいるのです。妹や姪のような人たちだっている。彼らを覚えていますか？他のみんなの血も見たいのですか？彼らにも復讐するのか、それとも私の命で十分なのか…どっちです？」
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: “不，我知道我必死无疑，但我身边还有许多手无寸铁的人。他们是我们的家人，既没有战斗的愿望，也没有战斗的力量。除此之外，还有我们的孩子、老人，还有像我妹妹、我侄女那样的人。你是想让手上也沾染他们的鲜血吗？你的怒火还要烧到那些人身上吗？或者说，我一个人的命就够了？”
languages.original_text: "No, I know I'm a dead man walking. But there are unarmed people here with me: our families, who have neither the desire nor the ability to fight. Our children, our elderly. People like my sister and niece. Do you want their blood on your hands as well? Will you take revenge on them, too, or is my life enough?"

traits.locale_text: “不，我知道我已经死定了，但我身边还有许多手无寸铁的人。他们是我们的家人，既没有战斗的愿望，也没有战斗的力量。除此之外，还有我们的孩子、老人，还有像我妹妹、侄女的那些人。你还记得她们吗？你想让你的手也沾上他们的鲜血吗？你的怒火还要烧到他们身上吗？还是说，我一个人的命就够了？”
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: "Nein, ich weiß, dass ich so gut wie tot bin. Doch ich habe hier Unbewaffnete bei mir. Unsere Familien, die weder den Wunsch noch die Fähigkeit besitzen, zu kämpfen. Unsere Kinder, unsere Alten. Leute wie meine Schwester und meine Nichte. Wollt Ihr auch ihr Blut an den Händen kleben haben? Rächt Ihr Euch auch an ihnen, oder reicht mein Leben aus?"
languages.original_text: "No, I know I'm a dead man walking. But there are unarmed people here with me: our families, who have neither the desire nor the ability to fight. Our children, our elderly. People like my sister and niece. Do you want their blood on your hands as well? Will you take revenge on them, too, or is my life enough?"

traits.locale_text: "Nein, ich weiß, dass ich so gut wie tot bin. Doch ich habe hier Unbewaffnete bei mir. Unsere Familien, die weder den Wunsch noch die Fähigkeit besitzen, zu kämpfen. Unsere Kinder, unsere Alten. Leute wie meine Schwester und meine Nichte. Erinnert Ihr Euch an sie? Wollt Ihr auch ihr Blut an den Händen kleben haben? Rächt Ihr Euch auch an ihnen, oder reicht mein Leben aus?"
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: « Pour ma part, je suis parfaitement conscient d'être condamné, mais j'ai avec moi des gens désarmés. Nos familles, qui n'ont ni la volonté ni la capacité de se battre. Nos enfants, nos vieillards. Ma sœur, ma nièce et tant d'autres.Vous voulez avoir leur sang sur les mains ? Vous contenterez-vous de ma vie, ou subiront-ils également votre vengeance ? »
languages.original_text: "No, I know I'm a dead man walking. But there are unarmed people here with me: our families, who have neither the desire nor the ability to fight. Our children, our elderly. People like my sister and niece. Do you want their blood on your hands as well? Will you take revenge on them, too, or is my life enough?"

traits.locale_text: « Pour ma part, je suis parfaitement conscient d'être condamné, mais j'ai avec moi des gens désarmés. Nos familles, qui n'ont ni la volonté ni la capacité de se battre. Nos enfants, nos vieillards. Ma sœur, ma nièce et tant d'autres. Les auriez-vous oubliés ? Vous voulez avoir leur sang sur les mains ? Vous contenterez-vous de ma vie, ou subiront-ils également votre vengeance ? »
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: "Hayır, kesin olarak öleceğimi biliyorum. Fakat yanımda silahsız insanlar var. Ailelerimiz. Savaşma arzusu veya kabiliyeti olmayan kimseler. Çocuklarımız ve yaşlılarımız. Kız kardeşim ve yeğenim gibi insanlar. Elinde onların kanı da olsun istiyor musun? Onlardan da intikam alacak mısın yoksa benim hayatımla mı yetineceksin?"
languages.original_text: "No, I know I'm a dead man walking. But there are unarmed people here with me: our families, who have neither the desire nor the ability to fight. Our children, our elderly. People like my sister and niece. Do you want their blood on your hands as well? Will you take revenge on them, too, or is my life enough?"
